name: snacke (rattias)
description:
Move your snake around in the maze (use your cursor keys on desktop/laptop, or the virtual controller on moblie). 

Eat the eggs to keep your health up (shown in the bar on the right, but make sure you don't bite yourself! Black eggs will temporarily impair your vision, and golden eggs will give you an adrenaline shock!

Watch for the holes: entering one will instantaneously take you out of a different one.

Best played in full screen mode on mobile. 

This game is free and ads-free. Any comment is appreciated.
